TopicTitle: im OPT-IN for prerelease and steam wont update to 1.1.3

Articles.Content: i do have opt-in selected for the prerelease, 1.1.3 is currently out but my game is still only on version 1.1.0.1228, i even tried going back to the last stable version and then back to prerelease again but it still didnt help. has anyone else had this issue?

Welcome aboard!

Opt out of the prerelease and your game will update to 1.1.3.
